title: Jillian and Justin
overview: This four-part documentary series takes an in-depth look at the challenges & triumphs of first-time parenthood and the quest to "have it all". Former Bachelorette and host of Love it or List it Vancouver Jillian Harris and longtime boyfriend/entrepreneur Justin Pasutto take on the biggest challenges of their lives: adjusting to their new roles as parents, building their forever home, keeping their careers afloat and their relationship intact. How will Jillian & Justin adjust to this new chapter in their lives where the only constants are challenge and change?
